attributes.action: Reduce duty on diesel fuel to encourage the use of diesel cars and reduce CO2 emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For some years now the duty on diesel fuel has been higher than petrol.  This is the opposite to most other countries and actively discourages the use of diesel cars in the UK.  A higher use of diesel cars would be a positive step to reducing CO2 emissions.  In addition transport costs would be reduced and hopefully reduce (or at least keep down) the cost of goods in the shops.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
